name: Night Terror: Run Away From Monsters
name_original: Night Terror: Run Away From Monsters
description:
You stepped into a mysterious forest at night. The monster of the forest finds you and tries to catch you. You have to run as fast as you can! Don't let the monster catch you.
All you have is just a flashlight. You can light forward to find your path out or to light backward to slow down the monster. It's both simple and exciting. How long can you survive?
